name: Acid Rain (MrNerix)
description:
Plot: At the start of the nuclear war most of the countries used nuclear weapons, thus almost all life on earth was gone. Few that survived had one hope left - to hide underground, however the cruel fate found its way to them. The acid rain falling from the sky was getting more corrosive as time carried on. Which ate away at the soil, that made holes appear and because of lack of oxygen in the air people started passing away form poisoning. However the last to survive aren't giving up...

If you do play the game play it in 1600x900
